## Flipped Classroom Model

This course uses a **flipped classroom** approach:

### Before Class
- Watch pre-reading videos
- Read relevant chapters
- Complete pre-quizzes
- Note questions

### During Class
- Discuss challenging concepts
- Work on problems collaboratively
- Get instructor guidance
- Apply knowledge to scenarios

### After Class
- Complete laboratory exercises
- Solve problem sets
- Work on projects
- Prepare for assessments
